meanings.sent1: He wanked in his room when no one was around.
meanings.sent2: She wanked before going to bed every night.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about how awkward it would be if everyone wanked in public.
meanings.sent4: The idea of wanking in a crowded room made him cringe.
meanings.sent5: The teenager's face turned red when his mom caught him wanking.

meanings.sent1: Yesterday, he wanked after a long day at work.
meanings.sent2: She wanked last night and felt relieved.
meanings.sent3: The cat wanked on the couch, leaving a mess for its owner to clean up.
meanings.sent4: The old car wanked along the bumpy road, struggling to keep up with the others.
meanings.sent5: The tree branches wanked in the wind, creating a soothing rustling sound.
